body.name: Mrs. Meyer's 670763EA Clean Day Room Freshener, Lavender, 8 oz, Non-Aerosol Spray

Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 11 hrs 53 mins
features: Free of artificial colors, parabens, animal derived ingredients and formaldehyde.
body.description: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Room Fresheners are specifically made to quickly freshen any room, while also providing a special, singular scent for your home. The Lavender scented room freshener has an original and clean floral scent. Such a pretty and reassuring herb! The non-aerosol Bottle quickly freshens any room for instant fragrance. This room freshener is made with essential oils and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients. Perfect for when you need to add a little garden-inspired fragrance to your home between cleaning days. Made without propellants, phthalates, parabens, or artificial colors - and of course, always a cruelty free formula room air freshener. Bottles (less trigger) made with at least 30% post-consumer plastic. Also available in other garden-inspired scents and products such as candles, laundry detergent, dish packs, and so much more!. Mrs. Meyer's - Rooted in Goodness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Making The World a More Compassionate Place One Garden At A Time Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day products are inspired by the garden, which is why we’re inspired to plant flowers, plants and trees. At Mrs. Meyer’s, we have a passion for the environment. We also know the importance of being a good neighbor in our home, our community and our world. That’s why we’ve made a commitment to improving the earth one flower, plant and tree at a time through our campaigns, partnerships, volunteering efforts and donations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting room air freshener
reviews.reviewText: I love all of Mrs. Meyer's products, including this one, but I am not so sure that the scent is true lavender...it smells delicious, but not so much like lavender. Besides that, the bottle is super easy to grab and spray, the product eliminates odors, and I am going to keep purchasing since the smell lasts a very long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I do not recommend multiple squirts because this is strong stuff
reviews.reviewText: All it takes is one spray to deodorize a large room. I do not recommend multiple squirts because this is strong stuff. The scent pleasantly lingers. The spray bottle has a safety feature so that the trigger can lock to keep little children from spraying. I bought the lavender scent and it smells nice as long as you do not over spray a room. I will buy this again to neutralize the odors in my classroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lavender long lasting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This lavender air freshener puts a pleasant scent into the air and helps replace bad odors. It's not as amazing as Pure Citrus but quite good. The Pure Citrus sprays a very fine mist that stays airborn longer than the larger droplets that this pump spray puts out. I've found two more uses for the Meyers air freshener - it will stop the squeak in a door hinge and smells a heck of a lot better than WD-40 and it also dissolved some sticky residue from something I had removed a label from. So an all around useful thing to have at hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The smell is on another level
reviews.reviewText: I’m a massage therapist I spray this after I sanitize a room and my clients love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beats Lie-Soul any day...
reviews.reviewText: It is a bit more expensive, doesn't give you as much, and in my case, must be ordered online, compared to Lysol, for example. But, to know that I am not contributing to the exploitation of millions of innocent creatures, is worth it, in my good book. And, when more people become conscience of these un-justices, the prices, will go down, and perhaps the quantity, up. 😍 Oh, and it smells yummy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST ROOM FRESHENER!
reviews.reviewText: Im ordering another one! Lovr the subtle scent, and no "chemical odor". Most air fresheners give me severe headaches, but this one is made without formaldehyde! LOVE IT!!!!!!!!Made with essential oils, not chemicals!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells great but only for a little
reviews.reviewText: As much as i love the smell it's fades quickly and doesn't really freshen anything. But it's great if you just want a nice scent on your sheets and such
I loved the scent of this spray. No harsh alcohol smell. It was like aromatherapy. I've ordered a couple of times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 4, 2021
reviews.reviewText: As far as I'm concerned, there's no trace of Lavender in this hand wash - it smells almost chemical. I'm very disappointed as it was recommended to me for it's delicious scent. It's pungent and harsh sadly. I won't buy it again.
Love the lavender room spray, really freshens the air, and lasts. Have had people mention how lovely my house smells after using it.
